name: RerunPreviousAbTest
description:
Rerun a previous A/B test on a landing page.

Initiate the rerun of a previous A/B test for a landing page in HubSpot CMS. Use this tool when you need to repeat an A/B test to validate or compare results.

parameters.name: variation_id
parameters.description: Provide the ID of the object you wish to reactivate as a test variation. This ID is necessary to specify which variation of the landing page you intend to rerun in the A/B test.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to reactivate as a test variation.

parameters.name: test_id_to_rerun
parameters.description: Provide the ID of the test you want to rerun on the landing page.

value_schema.description: ID of the test to rerun.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: variationId
parameters.description: ID of the object to reactivate as a test variation.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to reactivate as a test variation.

parameters.name: abTestId
parameters.description: ID of the test to rerun.

value_schema.description: ID of the test to rerun.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
